question: Abdul Majid, the famous actor, Director and writer passed away. He hailed from which state?
explanation: Abdul Majid (86), the famous actor, Director and writer, has passed away in Guwahati, Assam on September 24, 2017. In 1975, Mr Majid had directed an award winning movie Chameli Memsaab. Over the years, he acted in several movies, tv serials and Theatre. The film fraternity of the state has condoled the demise of the veteran actor.
